description: Aaron Michael Services offers modern flooring solutions including hardwood, luxury vinyl plank, tile, and eco-friendly options in Buffalo, Kenmore, Tonawanda, North Tonawanda, and Cheektowaga. Expert installation, maintenance, and repairs.

mainEntity.name: Which flooring type is best for high-traffic areas?

acceptedAnswer.text: LVP and tile are highly durable and low-maintenance, making them ideal for kitchens, entryways, and hallways.

mainEntity.name: Can I combine hardwood and LVP in one room?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, with proper transition strips and subfloor preparation, multiple flooring types can coexist seamlessly.

mainEntity.name: How often should I maintain my flooring?
